code:
def test_home_business_status_change(self):
        try:
            # 初始化发现页操作类（传入self即可复用所有minium对象）
            home_page = HomePage(self)

            # 链式调用公共方法，逻辑清晰
            home_page.goto_home_page()

            self.page.wait_for(
                lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(home_myhome_element, max_timeout=max_timeout),
                max_timeout=max_timeout)
            time.sleep(3)

            current_business_status = self.page.element_is_exists(myhome_friendship_status_element,
                                                                  max_timeout=max_timeout)
            if not current_business_status:
                # 点击我的主页 btn
                completeInfo_title_myhome_btn = self.page.get_element(home_myhome_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
                completeInfo_title_myhome_btn.tap()

                self.capture(f"点击我的主页_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}", region=self.page)
                self.logger.info(f"点击我的主页")

                time.sleep(5)

                # 切换为商务
                self.page.wait_for(
                    lambda: self.page.element_is_exists(myhome_friendship_status_element,
                                                        max_timeout=max_timeout),
                    max_timeout=max_timeout)

                status_popup = self.page.get_element(myhome_friendship_status_element, max_timeout=max_timeout)
  # 此步骤经过自动化工具修复, 原选择器/view[2]/scroll-view/view/view/view[1]/view[1]/view/view/view/text, 修复后选择器//scroll-view/view/view/view[1]/view[1]/view/view/view/text, 找到唯一元素/view/scroll-view/view[2]/view[2]/view/view/view[2]/view/view[1]/text
                status_popup.tap()

                self.capture(f"弹出切换状态弹窗后_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}", region=self.page)
                self.logger.info(f"弹出切换状态弹窗后")

                # 选择商务
                current_status = self.page.get_element(myhome_select_business_status_element,
                                                       max_timeout=max_timeout)
                current_status.tap()

                self.capture(f"个人说明书已切换至商务状态_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}", region=self.page)
                self.logger.info(f"个人说明书已切换至商务状态")
            else:
                self.capture(f"个人说明书当前状态已是商务_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")
                self.logger.info(f"个人说明书当前状态已是商务")

        except Exception as e:
            self.logger.error(f"个人说明书切换商务状态失败：{str(e)}")
            # 异常时截图
            self.capture(f"个人说明书切换商务状态失败_{time.strftime("%H%M%S")}")
            raise

        time.sleep(2)
